title: Barely able to login into the launcher
body:
Since the launch of the new client I have gotten a lot of issues regarding the connection with the client.
This doesnt seem to be a problem with my network but rather my computer since I cant replicate this issue with my laptop in the same network.
The issues became worse and now everytime I want to play I have to bruteforce myself into the client.

Case 1: 
I want to login with the new client. It keeps saying that it's Authenticating and after about a minute it says there was an unexpected error logging in.

Case 2:
I want to login with the new client. After a while instead of throwing an error, it logs me into my account but when I click for example "Play" then at first nothing happens. After a brief period it opens the Play menu and instantly gives me a "Trying to reconnect" screen.
(Note: The connection to the chat server works completely fine)

Case 3: 
I want to login with the legacy client. After the login creds are authenticated it says "Logging on.." for a while and then also throws an error.



This is a very weird issue because after hours of bruteforcing my way into the client it suddenly works and is completely stable without any problems until I close it. 
Often I'm changing network settings on my desktop computer (changing DNS, Firewall, renew connection, etc) with no immediate effect
It just suddenly works after a while, however the time spent trying to log in is still frustrating

replies.body: This sounds like more like a network problem than PC that's having problems connecting to a few of our servers including authentication.  I know you've done a few steps already, but I suggest going through every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to cover everything.  Let me know if you have any questions!
